entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Nelson Airport 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
